Title: 39001 - How to Do BYOD Right
Direction: 675 words: List 4-8 ways for a business to do "bring your own device" correctly. Discuss information on having a BYOD policy, how to control user access, if you will limit device options, etc. Write for an audience of small business owners and managers in larger firms; they already know what BYOD is, so give them information that will help them design a better BYOD policy. Include the client link by discussing how beneficial using your personal smartphone at work could be, from planning meetings to using various organizational apps.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: planning for meetings on your iPhone 5C

Title: 39002 - Connect These # Appliances to Your Smartphone
Direction: 675 words: List 4-8 appliances, from refrigerators to thermostats, that homeowners can control from their smartphones. Put a new twist on what these smartphone connections can do; most people know you can control the thermostat from a smartphone, so talk about another aspect of it, like energy management. The target audience is people who love home improvement and the latest in home technology. The anchor text will fit in any section, as long as the appliance mentioned has an iOS app.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: connecting your home appliances to your iPhone 5C

Title: 39019 - # Essential Apps for Telecommuting
Direction: 675 words: More professionals are spending less time in the office and spending more time telecommuting. In 4-8 subheadings, highlight some of the apps that can help telecommuters work more effectively and efficiently when they're out of the office. Make sure to write about a variety of apps, such as those for video conferencing with clients and colleagues in the office, apps for organization, apps for note taking, and more. You should easily be able to work in the client link when writing about one of these apps. Be sure to mention the price of each app and platforms it's available on. Your audience is business professionals who often telecommute and work out of office.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: working out of the office on your HTC One from T-Mobile

Title: 39021 - # Inspiring Apps for Redecorating Your Home
Direction: 675 words: Redecorating your home's interior is a great way to give your mood a lift and make a tired space feel brand new. However, when you've been staring at the same four walls for a while, it can be difficult to know where to start. That's where some great interior design apps come in. In 4-8 subheaders, highlight inspiring apps that homeowners can use during this process. Make sure to note which platforms the apps are available on and how much they cost. The client link should be easily incorporated into information about any one of the apps. Your audience is people who are interested in interior design or are currently redecorating their home.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: when viewing these apps on your t-mobile smartphone
